The Shiba Inu is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog from Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting. Wikipedia 
Hypoallergenic: No 
Higher classification: Dog 
Lifespan: 12 – 15 y 
Temperament: Charming, Alert, Faithful, Confident, Keen, Fearless 
Height: 35 – 43 cm (Adult, Male, At the withers), 33 – 41 cm (Adult, Female, At the withers) 
Mass: 8 kg on average (Adult, Female, At preferred size), 10 kg on average (Adult, Male, At preferred size)
